content: the top now work 1dc in every row in between the 2nd and 3rd st from the edge until you have 2 row left 123dc 2ch corner chain-2sp made turn to work along foundation miss 1st 2 sts 1dc into front loop of every st of chainless foundation to last 2 sts miss last 2 sts 83dc working down the right side miss next 2 row 2ch corner chain-2sp made 1dc in every row to last 2 placing double_crochet in between 2nd and 3rd st from the right edge 123dc 2ch corner chain-2sp made miss first 2 sts 1dc into the front loop of every st of top edge to last 2 sts miss 2 sts 2ch corner chain-2sp made sl-st to first double_crochet 83dc 412dc in total and 4 chain-2sps round 1 1ch does not counts as a st here and throughout *1dc in every st to next chain-2sp 1dc 2ch 1dc in next chain-2sp repeat from * to end sl-st to first double_crochet 420dc round 2 1ch 1htr in every st to next chain-2sp 1htr ch2 1htr in next chain-2sp repeat from * to end sl-st to 1st half_double_crochet 428htr round 3 as round 2 436htr fasten_off front edging with rs of blanket facing and a starting from the top left corner work a standing double_crochet in between the 2nd and 3rd st from the edge in the same place as the double_crochet worked on ws for back edging placing the double_crochet before the double_crochet from ws cont to work around blanket 412dc in total and 4ch-2sps rnds 1 3 as for back edging do not fasten_off joining edging 1ch join front and back edging by working double_crochet through corresponding sts of both edges to corner work 1dc 2ch 1dc in corner chain-space working through both front and back chain-sps repeat along all edges sl-st in 1st double_crochet fasten_off lapland blanket resources to help you crochet your lapland blanket we ve added two helpful video tutorials to our youtube channel click on the images below to take you directly to the tutorials or visit youtube com/c/westyorkshirespinners overlay mosaic technique wrapping up design anna nikipirowicz technical editor helen birch and sharon carter copyright this design is copyrighted and must not be crocheted for resale reproduction of this publication is protected by copyright and been made to ensure that instructions are correct west yorkshire spinners cannot accept any liabilities owing to photography and printing restrictions the colour reproduction is matched as closely as possible to the yarn wys1000290 join our facebook community wys crafter s hub 2 airedale park royd ings avenue keighley west yorkshire bd21 4dg +44 0 1535
